name: The Nightmare Castle
description:
Ivan is a strange adventurer who ends up in a strange place known as the nightmare realm there he must find a way out of this strange place or die trying 

in this prototype you must get to the end of the level but watch out their are monsters blocking your path. 

move whit the arrow keys and use the Z button to strike down the enemies  whit your sword.

this game is stil a prototype so it may be really unfinished and neer the end when the game freezes when you jump in the hole the game has finished

game cover icon by the great artist Main Bladewing twitter:https://twitter.com/MainBladewing
